It is a great part of town located about 4 blocks from Tavern on Rush Gibsons Lux Bar and North Face Nordstrom Lulu Blomingdales downstairs and lots of shops on Michigan Ave the main shopping street in Chicago
At the spa and restaurant the staff greets us by name after the first time we go during this visit
When I arrived back they had left me the most awesome dessert tray and the Housekeeping manager brought another
Room service was awesome especially the late night menu
On a quiet part of the miracle mile you ’re still close to all the best shopping and restaurants without the noise
Breakfast was great with super large portions you should share
1: There was a separate wet bar with a brass sink and faucet and a separate fridge exclusively for guest storage
